text.text: I am a frontend developer, building and designing things for the web
text.textDepr: I am a multimedia designer, specializing in frontend development.

about.title: About
descText: I am a passionate and ambitious frontend developer, with a creative flair.

Through my education in multimediadesign and frontend development, along with my education in arts and design, I have acuired a wide range of skills as well as knowledge, that I utilize when creating websites and apps .

Frontend development contains the things I am most passionate about: Problem solving and creativity. I love being able to develop solutions to problems through coding, as well as learning and exploring the best possible ways to do it.

descText: Feel free to send an email, whether you have any questions or just to say hi, and I'll get back to you!
